about_the_game:
Step into the world of Chip Crafters, a factory automation game where precision meets creativity! Take control of a cutting-edge factory and navigate the challenges of producing complex computer chips—one belt at a time. With unparalleled simulation detail, this is the ultimate experience for players who crave meticulous planning and rewarding problem-solving.

Key Features:

Precision Simulation: Witness your production belts in action as every item is simulated with astonishing accuracy. From collisions to workflow efficiency, every detail matters, keeping you immersed in the intricacies of factory management.

Strategic Micro-Management:

Design and optimize your factory layouts, ensuring every machine and belt operates at peak performance. Fine-tune every aspect to achieve maximum efficiency and avoid costly errors.

From Scratch to Spectacular:

Begin with humble resources and grow your operation into a sprawling industrial powerhouse. Plan every step carefully to transform raw materials into high-value chips.

Complex Resource Management:

Manage a diverse array of materials, including silicon, copper, and rare earth elements. Balance supply chains, prevent bottlenecks, and keep production humming smoothly.

Master CPU Manufacturing:

Dive deep into the fascinating world of chip production. Tackle each stage, from photolithography to wafer fabrication, in a detailed and realistic simulation of modern chip-making techniques.

Innovate and Advance:

Unlock cutting-edge technologies and upgrade your factory with powerful tools. Stay ahead of the curve as you expand your operation and push the boundaries of what's possible.

Unique Gameplay Mechanics:

  • Items can fall off belts due to collisions or insufficient space—plan carefully to avoid waste and inefficiency.

  • Negotiate and sign lucrative contracts with major companies, competing against rivals to deliver the best chips at the best price. Build your reputation, secure exclusive deals, and dominate the market as you outshine your competition.

  • Tackle special event challenges, like supply chain crises or equipment malfunctions, that test your problem-solving skills under pressure.

  • Expand beyond your factory to manage mining operations. Optimize extraction rates and logistics to ensure a steady flow of raw materials.

Take the helm, master the art of chip crafting, and build a factory that runs like clockwork. In Chip Crafters, every decision counts, and the path to success is yours to forge. Are you ready to craft the future?
